text:
Yup that's true.  I'm still in the process of creating the XML document for the 
new build.
creator: mdelagra@eb.com

text:
Hi Morgan,

when will the dbtags.tld be available?
Why isn't there a release build of the tags library in general and the dbtags
lib in particular (clicking any related download link always takes me to the
nightly build area. Quite confusing. What's going on here, anyway? This is well
apt to shatter my trust in software coming from apache.org).

I promise to get something up and running within a day using the dbtags lib and
now I don't even have a tld. Sigh.

Please give me something to rebuild my hope/trust/whatsoever on!

Regards
Georg
creator: georg-schmid@ti.com

text:
As temporary solution, the file can be found on apache anon CVS
in the jakarta-taglibs/dbtags/conf directory
creator: chp@info.ucl.ac.be
mdelagra@eb.com
text: *** Bug 2770 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: mdelagra@eb.com

text:
You can do as suggested above (retrieve the tld from the repository) or 
retrieve an earlier distribution (before the 18th I belive) until I've finished 
coverting to the new build.

creator: mdelagra@eb.com
